participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Creative, nostalgic, and lively. Enjoys expressing herself through dance and appreciates classic music.
participant_1.background: my favorite toy as a child as my lite brite. i was born in the early 80 s. i take dance lessons once a week. i also like old school hip hop. i love new kids on the block.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Friendly, family-oriented, and a foodie. Loves spending time with family and enjoys trying different cuisines.
participant_2.background: i've one brother. i like tacos. i have three sisters. i love dogs.
